name: Sonic the Hedgehog Battle
description:
ONLINE multiplayer BATTLE GAME.

Online multiplayer is quite inconsistent in whether or not it works. Try, try again.

CONTROLS :: WASD, SPACE, AND ARROWS::::: MOVE

Z ::::: HIT

M ::::: MAP????

Android apk possibly coming soon, no promises. Epic.

MACOS USERS: ignore scary Gatekeeper warnings by opening Finder > Navigating to the application > Right click > Open > Open.

LINUX USERS: ( THE ONLINE MULTIPLAYER DOES NOT SEEM TO BE WORKING ON LINUX ) The application is started by running start.sh.

WINDOWS USERS: you have it easy
